title: Ellen Johnson  Sirleaf  |  Archives of Women's Political Communication

quotes: She resigned this position to successfully participate in the 2005 presidential elections
resulting in her historic inauguration, on January 16, 2006, as president of Liberia.
was designated in 1999 by the Organisation of African Unity (OAU) to serve on the committee to investigate the Rwanda genocide
In 2011, she was re-elected to a second term in a run-off vote by an overwhelming margin.

organizations.name: Governance Reform Commission
quotes: as the chairperson of the Governance Reform Commission, where she led the country's anti-corruption reform.

organizations.name: Mano River Union
quotes: As president, Sirleaf served as the chairperson of the Mano River Union where she led the effort for political stability and economic cooperation among Sierra Leone, Guinea, Liberia and Côte d’Ivoire.

quotes: and was selected by UNIFEM as one of two persons to investigate and report on the effect of conflict on women and women's roles in peace building.
